line_1: O Jenny dear, the word is gane,
line_2: And that ye think this race o' men
Thence, countra wives, wi' toil an' pain,
May plunge an' plunge the kirn in vain;
For Oh! the yellow treasure's taen.

line_1: Their hearts o' stane, gin night are gane,
line_2: How monie hearts this day converts,

line_1: The time will ne'er be gane,
